name: vino9-claude-marketplace
description: Reusable Claude Code skills: GCP VM management, GitHub Issues for Claude Code Web, and Python development

plugins.name: boot-gcp-vm
plugins.description: Start a GCP VM and update local SSH config with its new IP address

plugins.name: github-issues
plugins.description: Read and comment on GitHub issues in Claude Code Web (where gh CLI doesn't work)

plugins.name: python-dev
plugins.description: Python project scaffolding, quality standards (ruff, ty), and test runner
